rows.label: tev900291_MSG0010
rows.name:
Hi, you!
Just the person I was hoping to see.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900291_MSG0020
rows.name:
Actually, I've been looking at data salvaged from
the Life Point for my research on Earth culture.

rows.label: tev900291_MSG0030
rows.name:
Among that data, the thing called a "novel"
is personally very interesting to me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900291_MSG0040
rows.name:
Making fictional stories into entertainment,
isn't that incredibly creative and wonderful?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900291_MSG0050
rows.name:
So, I'd like to try reading one, but
there's even more data than I expected......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900291_MSG0060
rows.name:
Apparently, they define categories using something called "genre."
Which genre do you think would be good for me to start with?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900291_JNK0070
rows.name: Sci-Fi

rows.label: tev900291_SEL0080
rows.name: Recommend a Sci-Fi novel.

rows.label: tev900291_MSG0090
rows.name:
Sci-Fi novel...hmm.
According to the data[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900291_MSG0100
rows.name:
Literary works depicting themes like advanced science and technology,
space travel, and extraterrestrial life,
falling into a relatively complex category[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900291_MSG0110
rows.name: Hmm... I see.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900291_MSG0120
rows.name:
...Huh? Wait a second.
If I think about it[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900291_MSG0130
rows.name:
That doesn't sound very original at all!
Wouldn't that fall under contemporary
writing?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900291_MSG0140
rows.name:
W-Well, maybe this is
a good chance to learn about humans' view of the universe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900291_JNK0150
rows.name: Mystery Novel

rows.label: tev900291_SEL0160
rows.name: Recommend a Mystery novel.

rows.label: tev900291_MSG0170
rows.name:
Mystery novel... hmm.
According to the data[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900291_MSG0180
rows.name:
Literary works centered on deducing the identity of a human
who committed a crime like murder or robbery
by investigating the remaining clues[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900291_MSG0190
rows.name: ...I see.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900291_MSG0200
rows.name:
In other words, this is a story themed around
the philosophical concept of what constitutes sin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900291_MSG0210
rows.name:
The concept of sin varies greatly
depending on the customs of each civilization...
Yes. This seems like it could be informative.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900291_JNK0220
rows.name: Novels for Young People

rows.label: tev900291_SEL0230
rows.name: Recommend novels for young people.

rows.label: tev900291_MSG0240
rows.name:
Hmm?
Let's see... According to the data[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900291_MSG0250
rows.name:
After death, reincarnated into another universe,
eliminating all enemies with power granted by God,
a grand epic about building paradise in that world[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900291_MSG0260
rows.name:
...Huh? Reincarnated into another universe...?
Um, what does that mean?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900291_MSG0270
rows.name:
And power granted by God...?
The God that humans worship,
does it really grant power so generously?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900291_MSG0280
rows.name:
Wh-What an amazing concept...
It seems incredibly difficult for me to grasp, but
this is human sensibility...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900291_MSG0290
rows.name:
In any case, thank you.
I'll take your opinion into consideration.[ST:wait ]
